Uses of Interface
com.google.bitcoin.wallet.WalletFiles.Listener

  • Packages that use WalletFiles.Listener 
    Package Description
    com.google.bitcoin.core  
    com.google.bitcoin.wallet  

    • Uses of WalletFiles.Listener in com.google.bitcoin.core

      Methods in com.google.bitcoin.core with parameters of type WalletFiles.Listener 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      WalletFiles Wallet.autosaveToFile(java.io.File f, long delayTime, java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit timeUnit, WalletFiles.Listener eventListener)
      Sets up the wallet to auto-save itself to the given file, using temp files with atomic renames to ensure consistency.

    • Uses of WalletFiles.Listener in com.google.bitcoin.wallet

      Methods in com.google.bitcoin.wallet with parameters of type WalletFiles.Listener 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void WalletFiles.setListener(WalletFiles.Listener listener)
      The given listener will be called on the autosave thread before and after the wallet is saved to disk.
